mapper.sql: e.id, e.make_friends_id as "makeFriends.id", e.user_id as "user.id", e.reply_content, e.reply_date, e.superior_reply, e.del_flag, e.create_by AS "createBy.id", e.create_date, e.update_by as "updateBy.id", e.update_date, u.user_name as "user.userName", u.img as "user.img"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM make_friends_reply e LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON u.id = e.user_id WHERE e.id =#{id}

SELECT
FROM make_friends_reply e LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON u.id = e.user_id WHERE e.make_friends_id =#{makeFriends.id} AND e.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} ORDER BY e.reply_date

SELECT
FROM make_friends_reply e LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON u.id = e.reply_person_id WHERE e.make_friends_id =#{makeFriends.id} and e.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} ORDER BY e.reply_date
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO make_friends_reply ( id, make_friends_id, user_id, reply_content, reply_date, superior_reply, superior_reply_user_id, del_flag, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date ) VALUES( #{id}, #{makeFriends.id}, #{user.id}, #{replyContent}, #{replyDate}, #{superiorReply}, #{superiorUser.id}, #{delFlag}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate} )
